zh.views.Kasumi.429841-0: Kasumi是一个安全领域的全能助手，也许你需要自动化工具链，也许你需要漏洞的PoC，又或许你需要解放你的双手，将你的工具提供给Kasumi，让她帮你完成工作。
zh.views.Kasumi.429841-1: 只要是你想得到的，Kasumi都能帮你实现。更重要的是，Kasumi是开源的，你可以随时随地的为她添加新的功能。
zh.views.Kasumi.429841-3: 就像你看到的那样，Kasumi是一个网络安全领域的全能助手，其核心开发理念为解放安全人员的生产力，让安全人员能够更加专注于安全本身，而不是工具的使用，并且，就像在视频里看到的那样
zh.views.Kasumi.429841-4: Kasumi已经成功落地了她所需要具备的功能，这就像Miduoduo团队的Slogan：让饼再次落地。
zh.views.Kasumi.429841-5: 作为一个开源项目，Kasumi的代码托管在Github上，你可以选择一起参与Kasumi的研发，也可以联系我们，分享彼此不一样的想法与创意，Miduoduo团队毫不吝啬分享自己的技术，我们希望能够与更多的人一起，为网络安全领域的发展贡献自己的力量。
zh.views.Kasumi.429841-7: Kasumi的源代码托管在Github上，你可以通过提交代码、提交文档、提交建议、提交反馈等方式来参与Kasumi的研发，也可以通过Star、Fork等方式来支持Kasumi的发展
zh.views.Kasumi.429841-8: 也可以联系我们的核心研发人员，他们会帮助你更好地了解Kasumi
zh.views.Kasumi.429841-10: 你可以通过社交媒体来关注我们，获取最新的动态，也可以通过社交媒体来与我们交流

en.views.Kasumi.429841-0: Kasumi is an AI assistant for security field. Maybe you need an automated toolchain, maybe you need a PoC of vulnerability, or maybe you need to free your hands and provide your tools to Kasumi to help you complete your work.
en.views.Kasumi.429841-1: Whaterver you want, Kasumi can help you achieve it. More importantly, Kasumi is open source, and you can add new features to her anytime, anywhere.
en.views.Kasumi.429841-3: As you can see, Kasumi is an AI assistant for security field. The core development concept is to liberate the productivity of security personnel, so that security personnel can focus more on security itself, not the use of tools, and, as you can see in the video
en.views.Kasumi.429841-4: Kasumi has successfully landed the functions she needs. This is like the Slogan of Miduoduo team: Make pie in the sky land again.
en.views.Kasumi.429841-5: As a open source project, Kasumi's code is hosted on Github. You can choose to participate in the development of Kasumi, or you can contact us to share different ideas and ideas with each other. Miduoduo team is not stingy to share their own technology. We hope to be able to work with more people to contribute to the development of network security
en.views.Kasumi.429841-7: Kasumi's source code is hosted on Github. You can participate in the development of Kasumi by submitting code, submitting documents, submitting suggestions, submitting feedback, etc., or you can support the development of Kasumi by Star, Fork, etc.
en.views.Kasumi.429841-8: Or you can contact our core developers, they will help you better understand Kasumi
en.views.Kasumi.429841-10: You can follow us through social media to get the latest news, or you can communicate with us through social media
en.views.Kasumi.429841-12: Welcome to Star and Fork our project~
